description: The Kari Traa Juliane Wool pants are a premium 100% Merino wool baselayer with a slim fit. Featuring a Jacquard knit and a retro-inspired design, these quick-drying, warm bottoms allow unrestricted movement and have next-to-skin softness. Breathable and naturally odor resistant, the Juliane is an elegant and enduring must-have for your winter wardrobe.
name: Juliane Wool Pants - Womens
